sentence.idiomatic: Nowadays transportation is convenient. A return trip between Beijing and Tianjin is only two hours.
If you get this kind of visa, you can go back and forth freely between China and the United States.
When is it possible to get a return train ticket to Beijing?
The specific itinerary of his upcoming trip to China will be announced at the end of this month.
Today's itinerary is very full. We might not have any rest time.
There are a lot of shopping activities in the itinerary planned by the travel agency.
The factory director took us on a tour of the production workshop.
This kind of exhibition is very interesting. You should tour around a bit more.
Yesterday they toured the largest school in the locality.
I've heard that the local handicrafts here are very famous.
You must develop the work based on the actual local situation.
If you're here, how can you not try the local delicacies?
I didn't change the answer. I trust my judgment.
I never expected that after just one day he would change his resolve.
Have you changed the PIN number on your bank card before?
Next year I want to apply to work overseas.
I want to apply to open a bank account for my child.
The number of people who have applied for this position up until now has already exceeded 2000.
He is not in very good form today. We'd better have an alternate player take his place on the field.
He has a lot of talent -- at such a young age he attained the position of Alternate Member of the Central Committee.
You are on the waiting list. You still have a chance.
Your reservation has been confirmed, you can go to your room now.
The missing child has been found. Please contact the family to come and identify him.
Do you have to go to the site tomorrow to confirm the registration information?
Await confirmation of his travel itinerary, then issue the ticket.
On the day of its premiere, this tickets issued for this movie reached 5,000.
The tickets for this band's concert will be formally issued starting this Sunday.
Nǐhǎo, Peter xiānsheng.

word.literal: a location outside of where one currently is
